name: Eador. Imperium
description: Hire heroes, build an army, prevail in battles and try to keep your empire intact in the face of grave danger. Eador. Imperium is a new chapter in Eador series, known for its unique blend of grand strategy, turn-based tactics and RPG elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: Intel® Pentium 2,0 GHz/AMD 2000+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7300/Radeon 9200 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP SP2 / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo 1.6/AMD 3000+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800/Radeon X1900 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
